attributes.title: Genuinely Bad
attributes.review: I would give 0 stars if I could. All jokes aside this is a useless app with no real information. The only thing I could find on here was campaign promos and passive aggressive articles that serve no point other than to divide the people. Not even trying to unite America like a president should.

attributes.title: APP IS BUGGED DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show my unyielding support for our glorious leader Donald J Trump but was extremely disappointed to see that the app took 3 MONTHS to download. Also, my cat has started speaking Russian and all of my TV’s have permanent Chinese subtitles that I can’t get rid of. -45/10 would not recommend. Safe travels Trump Train!

attributes.title: ...you did this for why
attributes.review: every time i try and start the app it takes forever to open :(( when it finally did load (after like. two hours.) the app CRASHED and my whole phone turned off. very very disappointed.

attributes.title: He is a clown🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡
attributes.review: I don’t like this app it won’t let me go to the kid section so he’s a clown if you support him your a clown too so 🤡🤡🤡🤡

attributes.title: SPREAD THE GOSPEL
attributes.review: Although this is a terrible terrible terrible app and trump is a terrible terrible terrible person, God has told me to spread the Gospel. I want you all to know that Jesus is coming soon! Don’t be left behind! It’s never too late to repent for your sins and get a close relationship with God and Jesus Christ. God is good. God lives you and so do I. ❤️❤️😇✝️

attributes.title: Appalling
attributes.review: I decided to get this app to help my orange leader but when I opened the app the ghosts in my house started to yell at me then they wouldn’t stop singing baby by Justin Bieber and turning my tv off every time I turned it on this app has ruined my life I haven’t slept in three days and I can’t get the ghosts to stop.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: this app is ridiculous!! i downloaded it and it wanted me to sign up with my social security, address, my whole family tree as far back as i can go and my race! it is not with it to get this app. all i saw when i opened the app was 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊. WORST APP EVER!!! not to mention the crusty cheeto on the front page!!

attributes.title: This is the worst app ever, Trump is out to ruin our lives
attributes.review: This app was really laggy, and took a while to download. Once I opened it, I was greeted with a giant picture of the worst man alive. Once I actually started using it, I was verbally abused by the same person. 10/10 would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: OUTRAGEOUS
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with the fullest intention of supporting my president and getting all the accurate and most recent news. However! It took an entire week to upload and when it finally finished it gave my phone a TERRIBLE VIRUS!!! This is not acceptable!!!! I am very upset+disappointed

attributes.title: Don’t Download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app immediately it asked me for a phone number and i without hesitation put it in then it started sending me messages saying “wanna see my toes” and i tried deleting it did not work it was giving me viruses and now i have donald trumps feet pics.
